about_the_game:
it's About The Journey
A game spawned from a game jam about making a challenging Platformer game.

A "short and sweet" game about making it to the top, patience, planning ahead and skills will need to be on your side.
detailed_description:
it's About The Journey
A game spawned from a game jam about making a challenging Platformer game.

A "short and sweet" game about making it to the top, patience, planning ahead and skills will need to be on your side.
name: It's about The Journey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: 2 GB RAM
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, or 10
  • Processor: 2GHz+
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
